Package net.jbouchard.bool

Class Summary
BooleanExpression A class to evaluate Boolean expressions composed of values, variables, binary and unary operators, and brackets based on dictionaries mapping variables to values.
BooleanExpressionSolver A class to input Boolean expressions from standard input and display truth tables of the expressions.
BooleanOperator An operator in a boolean expression with precedence and arity.
Brackets A utility class to work with brackets in Boolean expressions.
TruthTable A truth table of a collection of Boolean expressions and all variables used in the expression.
Variables Utility class to work with variables in a Boolean expression.
 

Enum Summary
BooleanExpression.ParseState Enumeration of possible states when parsing a Boolean expression
